mapper.insert: insert into userInfo (uname, userid, upasswd, zipcode, addr1, addr2, uemail, uphone, utype) value (#{uname}, #{userid}, #{upasswd}, #{zipcode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{uemail}, #{uphone}, #{utype})
mapper.select: select count(userid) cnt from userInfo where userid = #{userid}
select count(userid) cnt from userInfo where userid = #{userid} and upasswd = #{upasswd}
